description.value:
When you reach a Sorcerer level specified in the Clockwork Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Clockwork Spells
Sorcerer LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAid0000000]{Aid}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAlarm00000]{Alarm}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplProtEvilAn]{Protection from Evil and Good}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplProtFromEn]{Protection from Energy}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFreedomOfM]{Freedom of Movement}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSummonCons]{Summon Construct}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplWallOfForc]{Wall of Force}

In addition, consult the Manifestations of Order table and choose or randomly determine a way your connection to order manifests while you are casting any of your Sorcerer spells.

Manifestations of Order
[[/r d6]]Origin
1Spectral cogwheels hover behind you.
2The hands of a clock spin in your eyes.
3Your skin glows with a brassy sheen.
4Floating equations and geometric objects overlay your body.
5Your spellcasting focus temporarily takes the form of a Tiny clockwork mechanism.
6The ticking of gears or ringing of a clock can be heard by you and those affected by your magic.
